ResourceHeader.ResourceName: MMS 3 Energetic Particle Detector (EPD) Suite, Fly's Eye Energetic Particle Sensor (FEEPS) Instrument
ResourceHeader.Description: Fly's Eye Energetic Particle Sensor (FEEPS): The two FEEPS will measure three-dimensional energetic ion and electron flux distributions over the energy ranges ~25 keV to 500 keV (electrons) and ~45 keV to 500 keV (ions). Time resolution = 10 s. FEEPS development is led by Co-I J. B. Blake (Aerospace Corporation).

InformationURL.Name: Mission instrument web page
InformationURL.Description: Mission web page that describes the payload (instruments) on each spacecraft.
